title: New skin for kalista!
body:
Hello, everyone. I like like to say that {{champion:429}} NEEEDS a new skin the last skin was the championship skin which is no longer available anymore and blood moon skin is old. We need a new skin for her something that will separate her from the other ADC's a skin that makes her outstanding. Please riot make it happen.


-DragonPower17 2016

replies.body: proooooobably shouldve gotten gold to get championship kalista, haha :P
You don't need to be gold to get Championship skins. The Victorious skins are rewarded for players who reach gold.
Nah she doesn't, the championship skin makes her stand out alot from other adcs. There are many champions who deserves new skins like yorick, lee sin etc
Is there anyway to get championship kalista then?
Yes! However you can only get it during the world championship. The only championship skin that is unavailable to buy is championship riven.
do the old ones come out again like shyvana thresh and kalista? During worlds?
Not to be Rude but she really doesnt. Championship kalista is a great skin and stands out aswell. Several other champs could use new skins
